020
021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.format.FormatRule;
025import net.tnemc.core.utils.Monetary;
026import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
027
028import java.math.BigInteger;
029import java.util.Optional;
030
031public class ShortenRule implements FormatRule {
032
033  @Override
034  public String name() {
035
036    return "<shorten>";
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  public String format(@Nullable final Account account, final HoldingsEntry entry, String format) {
041
042    final Monetary monetary = entry.asMonetary();
043
044    if(format.contains("<shorten>")) {
045      format = "<symbol><short.amount>";
046    }
047
048    final Optional<Currency> currency = entry.currency();
049
050    if(currency.isEmpty() || monetary.major().compareTo(new BigInteger("1009")) <= 0) {
051      return format.replace("<short.amount>", monetary.major().toString());
052    }
053
054    final String whole = monetary.major().toString();
055    final int pos = ((whole.length() - 1) / 3) - 1;
056    final int posInclude = ((whole.length() % 3) == 0)? 3 : whole.length() % 3;
057    String wholeSub = whole.substring(0, posInclude);
058
059    if(whole.length() > 3) {
060      String extra = whole.substring(posInclude, posInclude + 2);
061      if(Integer.valueOf(extra) > 0) {
062        if(extra.endsWith("0")) {
063          extra = extra.substring(0, extra.length() - 1);
064        }
065        wholeSub = wholeSub + "." + extra;
066      }
067    }
068
069    final char pre;
070    if(currency.get().getPrefixes().length() < (pos + 1)) {
071      pre = '^';
072    } else {
073      pre = currency.get().getPrefixes().charAt(pos);
074    }
075
076    return format.replace("<short.amount>", wholeSub + pre);
077  }
078}
